snippet: The police killed a protester for the second time in two days during demonstrations in the oil-rich eastern province of Qatif.
abstract: Police in Saudi Arabia kill a protester for the second time in two days in the eastern province of Qatif, where a majority Shiite population has long complained of discrimination by the Sunni Muslim majority.

byline.contributor: Mayy El Sheikh contributed reporting from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: The police killed a protester for the second time in two days during demonstrations in the oil-rich eastern province of Qatif.

headline.main: Activists Report Death of Second Protester in Saudi Arabia
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: Second Protester Is Killed

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
